title: This / That / These / Those
description: Point to things near or far in space and number.

subtopics.title: Singular Demonstratives
subtopics.description: Use 'this' for something near and 'that' for something far.

subtopics.title: Plural Demonstratives
subtopics.description: Use 'these' for things near and 'those' for things far away.

exercises.instruction: Use a demonstrative in the sentence.
exercises.expected: Look at that car over there.
